result.arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ سُوٓءًا أَوۡ يَظۡلِمۡ نَفۡسَهُۥ ثُمَّ يَسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَ يَجِدِ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
result.translation: 110. Umaah Qaxumaane-le taamat Aseeh hinnay Yallih Amrih cinat isi nafsi yudlumeh yan num, tohuk lakal Yalla dambi cabti esserek, Yalla dambi cabti-li xuwaw-lih kaa geele.
